UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.8-N1
UpdateList.description: Visit http://cyanogenmod.com/changelogi for the CHANGELOG!

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.7.1-N1
UpdateList.description: Resync with Google as of 05/20/2010|New ARM optimizations in Bionic from Jim Huang @ 0xlab|Superuser 2.1 from ChainsDD|DeskClock style tweaks from Nathan Zachary|Email signature support from Jarrett Vance|Pin-lock and alternate lockscreen framework from _avatar|Updated Japanese locales from Takuo Kitame|Added Compcache and rzscontrol to the build|APN list updated by Paul Weiss, blunden, and PsychoI3oy.|Downloader allows any file to download - thanks Eddie Ringle|Kernel updated to 2.6.33.4|Fix bug with where wrong organization is shown in-call (Boyd Bischke)|Several kernel patches from Christopher Lais (Zinx) to improve stability and support MT3G Fender/1.2|Low memory killer was pimped out by San Mehat @ Google.  Big interactivity boost especially on D/S|Updated Phone patches from Cytown (v29)|Dim the deskclock screensaver colors|Fixed race conditions and notification bugs in MMS|Added quick uninstall "Delete Zone" to Launcher and Launcher2 (Ander Webbs)|Allow widgets in the Launcher default workspace (ported from Launcher2 by Lox)|Fix race conditions and bugs in MMS app|Compact drawer can be toggled for Launcher as well as Launcher2 now|Added squisher script for release builds|Another lowmemorykiller tweak from Zinx to take cache into account|Turned off battery percentage display by default|Added "omni-tether" from Wertarbyte for BT tether|System built using Zinx's resource-sorter patch for aapt- may provide perf boost|Patch from Zinx to have background processes holding wakelocks set to a higher OOM kill adjustment (push notify, mms are good examples)|Number of recent apps is configurable - Bcrook, Pershoot & Wysie|Ability to disable icons and paths on the lockscreen - Wysie|Add pand and hidd to the build|Fix OpenVPN- manifest was using the wrong mtpd|DeskClock: Add alarm timeout setting (Michael Webster)|OpenVPN: Select between TAP and TUN interface (Takuo Kitame)|Various UI element colors are selectable via Spare Parts (Wysie)|NEON-optimized libjpeg (CodeAurora/Qualcomm)|CPU clock and memory tweaks from Pershoot (http://github.com/pershoot)|Trackball notification color blending option (from Ehud Shabtai http://github.com/eshabtai)

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.6-N1
UpdateList.description: Merged AOSP from Google as of 3/31/2010|Ability to move installed applications between internal storage and SD (from Chris Soyars)|Added libncurses, lsof, irssi, htop, bash, nano and powertop.|Added option to disable USB Debugging notification.|5 column launcher drawer (from Kmobs and ChrisSoyars) - can be switched back to 4 column in Spare Parts|Animated GIF support in the browser (info from Google)|Updated translations from Eug89, RedVirus, and ThiasB|Yahoo mail can be used over wifi (from Invader@AllDroid)|Kernel is now built from source and installed properly by the Android build system (from Android-X86, tweaked by Wes Garner and Chris Soyars)|New camera features (antibanding, focus mode, jpeg quality) from CodeAurora|Battery percentage meter fix from ChainsDD|Fixed some bugs in Dropbear and added dropbear-keygen to generate host keys|New ARM NEON optimizations for Bionic from ARM and 0xlab (http://0xlab.org - Jim Huang)|Audio gain tweaks from Pershoot|Kernel 2.6.33.2|Launcher can auto-orientate now (enable in Spare Parts) - not really all that pretty but it works|Fix the Google backup transport. If you are doing a no-wipe install, run bmgr transport com.google.android.backup/.BackupTransportService in a shell to get it enabled.|More bugfixes from AOSP contributers (http://r.android.com)|Sexied up Nexus LWP from WootRoot and jeagoss with more colors, background, and trackball lighting|Added wireless-tools (iwconfig and friends) to the build|Reverted bcm4329 wifi driver to older version|Added option to set a system-wide http proxy server (this should really be a per-ssid setting though)|Allow Bluetooth in airplane mode (needs settings db update if installing w/o wipe)|Added some sounds back|Added trackball-unlock option from Kmobs (this conflicts with the music skip option)|Fix for the red/pink camera tint bug!! (from HTC/Google)|Number keys work on the vk in the Terminal app again (from Jack Palevich's Google Code project)|Added 5-minute screen timeout option|Potential fixes in build.prop to improve 3G speed on N1 - YMMV.

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.5.3-N1
UpdateList.description: Fix install issue where system partition is not reformatted|Fix crash in music app when album art is not readable

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.5.3-N1
UpdateList.description: Fix install issue where system partition is not reformatted|Fix crash in music app when album art is not readable

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.5.2-N1
UpdateList.description: Actually fix the OpenVPN issues|Added additional Chinese translations from clockrun|A2SD fixes: prune dex cache and reset permissions on protected packages|Revert the MMS layout changes to fix the right-side icons|Kernel brought up to date with Google|Fix issue where the install fails on a clean or non CM /system|Fix a minor bug in Superuser app|Disable V8 in Webkit and switch back to JSC due to app incompatibilities|Default white 'breathing light' is customizable (from ChainsDD)

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-5.0.5.1-N1
UpdateList.description: Visit www.cyanogenmod.com for the full changelog!

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.14.1
UpdateList.description: DeskClock and Music app from Eclair|Wysie's Contacts updated to latest|Browser MT updates, add feature to disable zoom controls|New wallpaper from Prash|Fix flashlight bug|Fixed auto-changing wallpapers bug again|Cytown's Phone mod updated to latest|Many other bugfixes

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.13
UpdateList.description: New multitouch code|Contacts app updated to Wysie's 2.7|Added backwards-compatibility code for services|Kernel update with new SDCC driver (from Nexus)|Fixed fix_permissions script|Various other bugfixes

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.10.1

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.8.1
UpdateList.description: Fixed unicode SMS issue|Darker launcher tray|Contacts app update from ChainsDD

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.8

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.7.1
UpdateList.description: Integrated CodeAurora ARM speedups with Google code (dalvik/bionic/libcutils/etc)|Updated APN list|Kernel update|Full OBEX FTP functionality

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.6
UpdateList.description: Updated to AOSP-1.6r2|More art from Eclair|Rollback some kernel changes that cuased instability|All locales now available|Many bugfixes

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.5
UpdateList.description: Eclair/Blur animations|Eclair Dalvik|Kernel tweaks|Brought back tiny video player|Cytown phone mod update|Contact list photos patch from Geesun|Browser fixes|USB tether thru wifi connection|Other bugfixes

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.4
UpdateList.description: OBEX fixes|Toggle Compcache from Spare Parts|Eclair icons and wallpapers|Updated Phone mod from Cytown (v20.1)|Updated BetterBrowser from Loccy|Tons of minor bugfixes and tweaks|Updated Superuser from ChainsDD/Zinx

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.3.1
UpdateList.description: USB Tethering support|Bluetooth OBEX support|Option to disable Launcher auto-orientation|Shined up drag handles from Prash

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.2
UpdateList.description: Fix build.prop so Google Voice works|Home icons disappearing bug should be fixed thanks to Zinx|FLAC is fixed (caused by NEW_FAIR_SLEEPERS in CFS, oddly enough)

UpdateList.name: CyanogenMod-4.2.1
UpdateList.description: UNIVERSAL! Runs on both Dream and Magic 32B|Based on Android 1.6, many bugfixes and enhancements from AOSP, XDA, and me|Highly optimized kernel with many extra modules|Enhanced ramdisk which uses optimal mount options and smart startup|Includes E2FSProgs for checking and converting Ext filesystems|Apps2SD is automatic! All you need is a second partition (ext).|Launcher with 5 screens and auto-orientation and compact drawer layout|Clean filesystem shutdown at poweroff/reboot, and fsck at boot (no FS corruption!)|Includes T-Mobile IM application, Amazon MP3 store, and Work Email (MS Exchange support)|Does not require 'DangerSPL'|Includes a massive APN list|Maximum CPU scaling frequency set to 528MHz with latency tweaks|Various enhancements to the Settings app including extra partition space|Phone app enhancements by cytown|Loccy's 'BetterBrowser'|MMS enhancements from rgv151|FLAC audio support thanks to kroot|Commandline extras: powertop, htop, nano, busybox, openvpn, openobex tools|Ability to lock home app in memory (control in Spare Parts app)
